briefTitle: Indacaterol EfectIveness In COPD Patients With Tuberculosis History
officialTitle: A Phase Ⅲb, Multicenter, Double-blind, Randomized, Controlled Trial, to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of Indacaterol (150㎍ o.d.) vs. Placebo, in Patients With Moderate-to-severe COPD With Destroyed Lung by Tuberculosis
conditions: Patients With Moderate-to-severe COPD With Destroyed Lung by Tuberculosis
summary: This clinical study will assess efficacy and safety of indacaterol (150㎍ o.d.) in patients with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) with destroyed lung by tuberculosis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Trough Forced Expiratory Volume in One Second Change
